Nguyen Duy Khanh
Hanoi, Vietnam
 (+84)363642295  duykhanh1310@gmail.com  Skype: silvercoe_oct13
Nanyang Technology University
May 2014 - May 2016
Hanoi University of Business and Technology
Sep 2010 - Apr 2014
EDUCATION
Major: Computer Science
Major: Business English
Miyatsu
Sept 2018 - Nov 2018
Evolable Asia Solutions
Mar 2018 - Sept 2018
Euroland Investor Asia
Sept 2016 - Mar 2018
WORK EXPERIENCE
React-native developer
- I currently fix existing bugs, recommend solutions for team, adding new features and researching new
technology.
- This is my first time approaching with block-chain technology and I am really impressed by the benefits and
potential it brings to our world. Additionally, applying it to the React-native app is not so complex than I
thought.
React-native developer
- Growth from Euroland Asia, I was trained tough to be responsible for higher responsibilities. At Evolable
Asia Solutions, I lead a react-native team and work directly with Japanese customers. My mission is to
communicate with customer, offer the best solution for their project, reading and writing spec documents,
building project structure, assign task to team member and work closely together to deliver the product on time
with minimum effort and bugs.
React-native developer
- In Euroland Investor, we provide software solutions for investors. As a front-end developer, I contributed to
the development of myIRapp which is react-native mobile application allowing investors understand
thoroughly about the company's performance and help them don't miss important information.
- I was lucky to work with a smart mobile team in which I learned a lot of things from them from coding clean,
analyze spec, applying base programming skill to solving any problems. We initially developed myIRapp with
the ionic framework, then my leader decided to transfer to react-native due to the performance differences
between the 2 frameworks. Our 5 people learned fast to apply react-native to our current ionic application. It
had been a tough time for us because react-native is totally different, especially Redux part. Ultimately, we
controlled the React ecosystem and re-organized, developed the myIRApp successfully.
IELTS Certificate with score 7.5 issued by British Council
2014
CERTIFICATIONS

Various, mainly in Europe, China

We initially developed myIRapp with the ionic framework, then my leader decided
to transfer to react-native due to the performance differences between the 2
frameworks. Our 5 people learned fast to apply react-native to our current ionic
application. It had been a tough time for us because react-native is totally different,
especially Redux part. Ultimately, we controlled the React ecosystem and re-
organized, developed the myIRApp successfully.

experiences.detail:
I currently fix existing bugs, recommend solutions for team, adding new features and researching new technology.
- This is my first time approaching with block-chain technology and I am really impressed by the benefits and potential it brings to our world. Additionally, applying it to the React-native app is not so complex than I thought.

I lead a react-native team and work directly with Japanese customers. My mission is to communicate with customer, offer the best solution for their project, reading and writing spec documents, building project structure, assign task to team member and work closely together to deliver the product on time with minimum effort and bugs.

In Euroland Investor, we provide software solutions for investors. As a front-end developer, I contributed to the development of myIRapp which is react-native mobile application allowing investors understand thoroughly about the company's performance and help them don't miss important information.
- I was lucky to work with a smart mobile team in which I learned a lot of things from them from coding clean, analyze spec, applying base programming skill to solving any problems. We initially developed myIRapp with the ionic framework, then my leader decided to transfer to react-native due to the performance differences between the 2 frameworks. Our 5 people learned fast to apply react-native to our current ionic application. It had been a tough time for us because react-native is totally different, especially Redux part. Ultimately, we controlled the React ecosystem and re-organized, developed the myIRApp successfully.
